title: Kraken2 Classification Reports Per Sample
description: Kraken2 classification reports for each sample within a group, as produced by the RUN workflow and concatenated by the DOWNSTREAM workflow. Each row represents one taxon's classification statistics for a sample, split by ribosomal/non-ribosomal classification.

fields.name: pc_reads_total
fields.title: Percentage of Total Reads
fields.description: Percentage of total reads rooted at this taxon.

fields.name: n_reads_clade
fields.title: Clade Read Count
fields.description: Number of reads assigned to the clade rooted at this taxon.

fields.name: n_reads_direct
fields.title: Direct Read Count
fields.description: Number of reads assigned directly to this taxon.

fields.name: n_minimizers_total
fields.title: Total Minimizers
fields.description: Total number of minimizers associated with this taxon.

fields.name: n_minimizers_distinct
fields.title: Distinct Minimizers
fields.description: Number of distinct minimizers associated with this taxon.

fields.name: rank
fields.title: Taxonomic Rank
fields.description: Taxonomic rank code (e.g. R for root, D for domain, S for species).

fields.name: taxid
fields.title: Taxonomy ID
fields.description: NCBI taxonomy ID for the taxon.

fields.name: sample
fields.title: Sample
fields.description: Sample identifier from the RUN workflow.

fields.name: ribosomal
fields.title: Ribosomal
fields.description: Whether this row is from ribosomal (TRUE) or non-ribosomal (FALSE) read classification.

fields.name: group
fields.title: Group
fields.description: Group identifier assigned to this sample in the grouping TSV.
